decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.
Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [22.008.P2.EX00, 22.008.P2.EX01, 22.008.P2.EX02, 22.008.P2.EX03, 22.008.P2.EX04, 22.008.P2.PA01, 22.008.P2.PA02, 22.008.P2.PA03, 22.008.P2.PA04, Heritage Impact Assessment & Design and Access Statement;].
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Reason: In order to safeguard the appearance of the area.
description: Listed building consent for the insertion of a rooflight into the inner slope of the rear extension
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
LPA ref: 01234/20/L18 - Listed building consent for erection of a single storey rear infill extension, side and rear roof dormers, internal alterations and layout changes to all floors, replacement staircase, reinstatement of cellar, demolition of existing pergola and erection of detached outbuilding. Granted 20.12.2023

changes to all floors, replacement staircase, reinstatement of cellar, demolition of existing pergola and erection of detached outbuilding. Granted 20.12.2023
